Welcome to our Github repository's project pages.
These pages were set up to help users navigate information pertainining to the TEA-DT Community Pulse Check.

On this site you will find (among other things) the following:

- Information about the TEA-DT project and the community pulse check
- Details about our methodology
- Results of the survey analysis
- News and Updates

## News & Updates

- We'll give a brief roundup of the survey results during a DT Hub [Gemini Call](https://digitaltwinhub.co.uk/gemini-call/) on Dec 3rd 2024 - Join us!
